alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 2:58AM MST until January 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Additional snow accumulations 3 to 5 inches, with higher amounts above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Accumulating snow between 2 and 4 inches is possible on Buck and Doe Road as well as Hualapai Mountain Road, resulting in hazardous road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
